question: Which airport is set to be renamed as Maryada Purushottam Sriram Airport?
explanation:
The Government of UP in its state budget has announced that the under-construction airport at Ayodhya would be named as Maryada Purushottam Sriram Airport.
The budget has made a provision for Rs.101 crores for the airport. It is also envisaged that the airport would soon be made an international airport.
